text: This is a list of all the current members of the United States House of Representatives. The number of voting representatives in the House is fixed by law at no more than 435, proportionally representing the population of the 50 states. , 219 representatives are part of the Republican Party, 215 representatives are part of the Democratic Party and 1 seat is vacant. There are also delegates from the United States territories. These delegates cannot vote but can take part in committees and other jobs. ==List of representatives== List of representatives as of January 3, 2025: District Member Party Party Born Prior experience
